articles.author: Bill Toulas
articles.title: Android Malware Posing as System Update Steals Sensitive Data - TechNadu
articles.description: Researchers discovered a new spyware that poses as an Android system updater utility and can steal literally everything.
articles.content:
• Researchers discovered a new spyware that poses as an Android system updater utility.
  • The malware can steal literally everything from the device, as long as the data is fresh.
